title: Spiked Savannah Smiles Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Spiked Savannah Smiles Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Makes
2 milkshakes
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
cups
vanilla ice cream
(
18
ounces
/ about
6
scoops
)
1/2
cup
whole milk
2
ounces
lemon vodka
3
teaspoons
finely grated lemon zest
, from
2
medium
lemons
1/4
cup
freshly squeezed lemon juice
from
2
medium
lemons
Garnish:
whipped cream
, additional
lemon zest
,
maraschino cherry
if desired
Directions
Add ice cream, milk, vodka, lemon zest, and lemon juice to blender. Purée until smooth. Divide among serving glasses, garnish as desired.
Special equipment
Blender
Ice Cream
Dairy Milk
Vodka
Frozen Drinks
